questions.question: In addition to the windmill, what other obstacle do the animals face during the winter?

choices.answer: The humans keep trying to take back the farm.
They are low on food and facing starvation.
The horses start speaking up against the pigs' rules.
The harsh weather causes many animals to freeze at night.

questions.question: When Napoleon tells the hens to give up all their eggs for trading, how do the hens react at first?

choices.answer: They agree because they want to support the farm.
They agree because they are scared of Squealer.
They protested that taking their eggs was murder.
They protested because they didn't like Napoleon.

questions.question: What does Squealer tell the animals about Snowball?

choices.answer: He tells them Snowball has died and is no longer a threat.
He tells them it was a mistake to run Snowball off the farm.
He tells them Snowball is going to be welcomed back to the farm.
He tells them Snowball has been converting animals into secret agents for J

questions.question: Does Boxer believe Squealer's speech about Snowball?

choices.answer: Boxer doubts Squealer, but Squealer convinces him.
Boxer doubts Squealer, starts telling the other animals Squealer is lying
Boxer doubts Squealer, and nothing Squealer says can change his mind.
